data.author: Leo Durocher
data.quote: I come to win.

data.author: Roes Kennedy
data.quote: I know not age, nor weariness nor defeat.

data.author: Edgar Cayce
data.quote: There is a progress whether you are going forward or backward! The thing is to move!

data.author: Shiv Khera
data.quote: Your positive action combined with positive thinking results in success.

data.author: Lyndon B. Johnson
data.quote: Yesterday is not ours to recover, but tommorrow is ours to win or lose.

data.author: Matt Cameron
data.quote: Live life to the fullest, and focus on the positive.

data.author: Winston Churchill
data.quote: Courage is going from failure to failure without losing enthusiasm.

data.author: Oprah Winfrey
data.quote: I don't believe in failure. It is not failure if you enjoyed the process.

data.author: Marcus Aurelius
data.quote: Very little is needed to make a happy life; it is all within yourself, in your way of thinking.

data.author: Napoleon Hill
data.quote: All achievements, all earned riches, have their beginning in an idea.

data.author: Amella Earhart
data.quote: The most effective way to do it, is to do it.

data.author: Helen Keller
data.quote: The most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched. They must be felt with the heart.

data.author: Confucius
data.quote: The superior man is modest in his speech, but exceeds in his actions.

data.author: Toni Morrison
data.quote: If you surrender to the wind, you can ride it.

data.author: Napoleon Hill
data.quote: All achievements, all earned riches, have their beginning in an idea.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.quote: Life is a gift, and it offers us the privilege, opportunity, and responsibility to give something back by becoming more.

data.author: Maya Angelou
data.quote: I can be changed by what happens to me. But I refuse to be reduced by it.

data.author: Dick Vermeil
data.quote: If you don't invest very much, then defeat doesn't hurt very much and winning is not very exciting.

data.author: Franklin Roosevelt
data.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.quote: Successful people ask better questions, and as a result, they get better answers.
